FuncDef: The rmon-statistics enable command enables the RMON statistics function on an interface. The undo rmon-statistics command disables the RMON statistics function on an interface. By default, the RMON statistics function is disabled on an interface.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view
ExtraInfo: If traffic statistics need to be collected and recorded on an Ethernet interface, the rmon statistics function must be enabled using the rmon-statistics enable command.
